description: Crafted from 100% recycled polyester polar fleece, they offer quick warmth and exceptional comfort. Reinforced at the buttocks and knees, they ensure outstanding durability, whether you're splitting logs for a campfire or sitting on rugged surfaces. The elastic waistband with an integrated adjustable belt, along with the elasticated ankles, provides unmatched comfort, allowing you to fully embrace the fresh forest air.
name: Hooke Camper Jogger Pants - Mens
